   16: 
   17: -module(cluster_commands_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -import(distributed_helper, [add_node_to_cluster/1, rpc/5,
   21:         remove_node_from_cluster/1, is_sm_distributed/0]).
   22: -import(ejabberdctl_helper, [ejabberdctl/3, rpc_call/3]).
   23: -import(ejabberd_node_utils, [mim/0, mim2/0, fed/0]).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -define(LOCAL_NODE, mim()).
   28: -define(eq(Expected, Actual), ?assertEqual(Expected, Actual)).
   29: -define(ne(A, B), ?assertNot(A == B)).
   30: 
   31: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: %% Suite configuration
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: 
   35: all() ->
   36:     [{group, clustered},
   37:         {group, ejabberdctl},
   38:         {group, clustering_two},
   39:         {group, clustering_theree}].
   40: groups() ->
   41:     [{clustered, [], [one_to_one_message]},
   42:         {clustering_two, [],
   43:             [join_successful,
   44:             leave_successful,
   45:             join_unsuccessful,
   46:             leave_unsuccessful,
   47:             leave_but_no_cluster,
   48:             join_twice,
   49:             leave_twice]},
   50:         {clustering_theree, [shuffle],
   51:             [cluster_of_theree, leave_the_theree]},
   52:         {ejabberdctl, [], [set_master_test]}].
   53: suite() ->
   54:     require_all_nodes() ++
   55:     escalus:suite().
   56: 
   57: require_all_nodes() ->
   58:     [{require, mim_node, {hosts, mim, node}},
   59:      {require, mim_node2, {hosts, mim2, node}},
   60:      {require, fed_node, {hosts, fed, node}}].
   61: 
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: %% Init & teardown
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: 
   66: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   67:     Node1 = mim(),
   68:     Node2 = mim2(),
   69:     Node3 = fed(),
   70:     Config1 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Node1, Config),
   71:     Config2 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Node2, Config1),
   72:     Config3 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Node3, Config2),
   73:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Node2, Config3),
   74:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Node3, Config3),
   75:     MainDomain = ct:get_config({hosts, mim, domain}),
   76:     Ch = [{hosts, "[\"" ++ binary_to_list(MainDomain) ++ "\"]"}],
   77:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file(Node2, "reltool_vars/node2_vars.config", Ch, Config3),
   78:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_ctl(Node2, reload_local, Config2),
   79:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file(Node3, "reltool_vars/fed1_vars.config", Ch, Config3),
   80:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_ctl(Node3, reload_local, Config2),
   81:     NodeCtlPath = distributed_helper:ctl_path(Node1, Config3),
   82:     Node2CtlPath = distributed_helper:ctl_path(Node2, Config3),
   83:     Node3CtlPath = distributed_helper:ctl_path(Node3, Config3),
   84:     escalus:init_per_suite([{ctl_path_atom(Node1), NodeCtlPath},
   85:         {ctl_path_atom(Node2), Node2CtlPath},
   86:         {ctl_path_atom(Node3), Node3CtlPath}]
   87:     ++ Config3).
   88: 
   89: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   90:     Node2 = mim2(),
   91:     Node3 = fed(),
   92:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Node2, Config),
   93:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Node3, Config),
   94:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(Node2, ejabberd),
   95:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(Node3, ejabberd),
   96:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   97: 
   98: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == clustered orelse Group == ejabberdctl ->
   99:     Config1 = add_node_to_cluster(Config),
  100:     case is_sm_distributed() of
  101:         true ->
  102:             escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice, clusterguy]));
  103:         {false, Backend} ->
  104:             ct:pal("Backend ~p doesn't support distributed tests", [Backend]),
  105:             remove_node_from_cluster(Config1),
  106:             {skip, nondistributed_sm}
  107:     end;
  108: 
  109: init_per_group(Group, _Config) when Group == clustering_two orelse Group == clustering_theree ->
  110:     case is_sm_distributed() of
  111:         true ->
  112:             ok;
  113:         {false, Backend} ->
  114:             ct:pal("Backend ~p doesn't support distributed tests", [Backend]),
  115:             {skip, nondistributed_sm}
  116:     end;
  117: 
  118: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  119:     escalus:create_users(Config).
  120: 
  121: end_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == clustered orelse Group == ejabberdctl ->
  122:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, clusterguy])),
  123:     remove_node_from_cluster(Config);
  124: 
  125: %% Users are gone after mnesia cleaning
  126: %% hence there is no need to delete them manually
  127: end_per_group(Group, _Config) when Group == clustering_two orelse Group == clustering_theree ->
  128:     ok;
  129: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  130:     escalus:delete_users(Config).
  131: 
  132: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  133:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  134: 
  135: end_per_testcase(cluster_of_theree, Config) ->
  136:     Timeout = timer:seconds(60),
  137:     Node2 = mim2(),
  138:     Node3 = fed(),
  139:     ok = rpc(Node2, mongoose_cluster, leave, [], Timeout),
  140:     ok = rpc(Node3, mongoose_cluster, leave, [], Timeout),
  141:     escalus:end_per_testcase(cluster_of_theree, Config);
  142: 
  143: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) when CaseName == join_successful
  144:                                    orelse CaseName == leave_unsuccessful
  145:                                    orelse CaseName == join_twice ->
  146:     remove_node_from_cluster(Config),
  147:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config);
  148: 
  149: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  150:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  151: 
  152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  153: %% Message tests
  154: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  155: 
  156: one_to_one_message(ConfigIn) ->
  157:     %% Given Alice connected to node one and ClusterGuy connected to node two
  158:     Metrics = [{[data, dist], [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}],
  159:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, Metrics} | ConfigIn],
  160:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {clusterguy, 1}], fun(Alice, ClusterGuy) ->
  161:         %% When Alice sends a message to ClusterGuy
  162:         Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(ClusterGuy, <<"Hi!">>),
  163:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg1),
  164:         %% Then he receives it
  165:         Stanza1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(ClusterGuy, 5000),
  166:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi!">>], Stanza1),
  167: 
  168:         %% When ClusterGuy sends a response
  169:         Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Oh hi!">>),
  170:         escalus:send(ClusterGuy, Msg2),
  171:         %% Then Alice also receives it
  172:         Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
  173:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Oh hi!">>], Stanza2)
  174:     end).
  175: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  176: %% Ejabberdctl tests
  177: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  178: 
  179: set_master_test(ConfigIn) ->
  180:     TableName = passwd,
  181:     NodeList = nodes(),
  182:     ejabberdctl("set_master", ["self"], ConfigIn),
  183:     [MasterNode] = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, master_nodes]),
  184:     true = lists:member(MasterNode, NodeList),
  185:     RestNodesList = lists:delete(MasterNode, NodeList),
  186:     OtherNode = hd(RestNodesList),
  187:     ejabberdctl("set_master", [atom_to_list(OtherNode)], ConfigIn),
  188:     [OtherNode] = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, master_nodes]),
  189:     ejabberdctl("set_master", ["self"], ConfigIn),
  190:     [MasterNode] = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, master_nodes]).
  191: 
  192: join_successful(Config) ->
  193:     %% given
  194:     Node2 = mim2(),
  195:     %% when
  196:     {_, OpCode} = ejabberdctl_interactive("join_cluster", [atom_to_list(Node2)], "yes\n", Config),
  197:     %% then
  198:     distributed_helper:verify_result(add),
  199:     ?eq(0, OpCode).
  200: 
  201: leave_successful(Config) ->
  202:     %% given
  203:     add_node_to_cluster(Config),
  204:     %% when
  205:     {_, OpCode} = ejabberdctl_interactive("leave_cluster", [], "yes\n", Config),
  206:     %% then
  207:     distributed_helper:verify_result(remove),
  208:     ?eq(0, OpCode).
  209: 
  210: join_unsuccessful(Config) ->
  211:     %% when
  212:     {_, OpCode} = ejabberdctl_interactive("join_cluster", [], "no\n", Config),
  213:     %% then
  214:     distributed_helper:verify_result(remove),
  215:     ?ne(0, OpCode).
  216: 
  217: leave_unsuccessful(Config) ->
  218:     %% given
  219:     add_node_to_cluster(Config),
  220:     %% when
  221:     {_, OpCode} = ejabberdctl_interactive("leave_cluster", [], "no\n", Config),
  222:     %% then
  223:     distributed_helper:verify_result(add),
  224:     ?ne(0, OpCode).
  225: 
  226: leave_but_no_cluster(Config) ->
  227:     %% when
  228:     {_, OpCode} = ejabberdctl_interactive("leave_cluster", [], "yes\n", Config),
  229:     %% then
  230:     distributed_helper:verify_result(remove),
  231:     ?ne(0, OpCode).
  232: 
  233: join_twice(Config) ->
  234:     %% given
  235:     Node2 = mim2(),
  236:     %% when
  237:     {_, OpCode1} = ejabberdctl_interactive("join_cluster", [atom_to_list(Node2)], "yes\n", Config),
  238:     {_, OpCode2} = ejabberdctl_interactive("join_cluster", [atom_to_list(Node2)], "yes\n", Config),
  239:     %% then
  240:     distributed_helper:verify_result(add),
  241:     ?eq(0, OpCode1),
  242:     ?ne(0, OpCode2).
  243: 
  244: leave_twice(Config) ->
  245:     %% given
  246:     add_node_to_cluster(Config),
  247:     %% when
  248:     {_, OpCode1} = ejabberdctl_interactive("leave_cluster", [], "yes\n", Config),
  249:     {_, OpCode2} = ejabberdctl_interactive("leave_cluster", [], "yes\n", Config),
  250:     %% then
  251:     distributed_helper:verify_result(remove),
  252:     ?eq(0, OpCode1),
  253:     ?ne(0, OpCode2).
  254: 
  255: cluster_of_theree(Config) ->
  256:     %% given
  257:     ClusterMember = mim(),
  258:     Node2 = mim2(),
  259:     Node3 = fed(),
  260:     %% when
  261:     {_, OpCode1} = ejabberdctl_interactive(Node2, "join_cluster", [atom_to_list(ClusterMember)], "yes\n", Config),
  262:     {_, OpCode2} = ejabberdctl_interactive(Node3, "join_cluster", [atom_to_list(ClusterMember)], "yes\n", Config),
  263:     %% then
  264:     ?eq(0, OpCode1),
  265:     ?eq(0, OpCode2),
  266:     nodes_clustered(Node2, ClusterMember, true),
  267:     nodes_clustered(Node3, ClusterMember, true),
  268:     nodes_clustered(Node2, Node3, true).
  269: 
  270: leave_the_theree(Config) ->
  271:     %% given
  272:     Timeout = timer:seconds(60),
  273:     ClusterMember = mim(),
  274:     Node2 = mim2(),
  275:     Node3 = fed(),
  276:     ok = rpc(Node2, mongoose_cluster, join, [ClusterMember], Timeout),
  277:     ok = rpc(Node3, mongoose_cluster, join, [ClusterMember], Timeout),
  278:     %% when
  279:     {_, OpCode1} = ejabberdctl_interactive(Node2, "leave_cluster", [], "yes\n", Config),
  280:     nodes_clustered(Node2, ClusterMember, false),
  281:     nodes_clustered(Node3, ClusterMember, true),
  282:     {_, OpCode2} = ejabberdctl_interactive(Node3, "leave_cluster", [], "yes\n", Config),
  283:     %% then
  284:     nodes_clustered(Node3, ClusterMember, false),
  285:     nodes_clustered(Node2, Node3, false),
  286:     ?eq(0, OpCode1),
  287:     ?eq(0, OpCode2).
  288: 
  289: 
  290: %% Helpers
  291: ejabberdctl_interactive(C, A, R, Config) ->
  292:     DefaultNode = mim(),
  293:     ejabberdctl_interactive(DefaultNode, C, A, R, Config).
  294: ejabberdctl_interactive(Node, Cmd, Args, Response, Config) ->
  295:     CtlCmd = escalus_config:get_config(ctl_path_atom(Node), Config),
  296:     run_interactive(string:join([CtlCmd, Cmd | normalize_args(Args)], " "), Response).
  297: 
  298: ctl_path_atom(NodeName) ->
  299:     CtlString = atom_to_list(NodeName) ++ "_ctl",
  300:     list_to_atom(CtlString).
  301: normalize_args(Args) ->
  302:     lists:map(fun
  303:                   (Arg) when is_binary(Arg) ->
  304:                       binary_to_list(Arg);
  305:                   (Arg) when is_list(Arg) ->
  306:                       Arg
  307:               end, Args).
  308: 
  309: %% Long timeout for mnesia and ejabberd app restart
  310: run_interactive(Cmd, Response) ->
  311:     run_interactive(Cmd, Response, timer:seconds(30)).
  312: 
  313: run_interactive(Cmd, Response, Timeout) ->
  314:     Port = erlang:open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [exit_status]),
  315:     %% respond to interactive question (yes/no)
  316:     Port ! {self(), {command, Response}},
  317:     loop(Port, [], Timeout).
  318: 
  319: loop(Port, Data, Timeout) ->
  320:     receive
  321:         {Port, {data, NewData}} -> loop(Port, Data ++ NewData, Timeout);
  322:         {Port, {exit_status, ExitStatus}} -> {Data, ExitStatus}
  323:     after Timeout ->
  324:         throw(timeout)
  325:     end.
  326: 
  327: nodes_clustered(Node1, Node2, ShouldBe) ->
  328:     DbNodes1 = distributed_helper:rpc(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]),
  329:     DbNodes2 = distributed_helper:rpc(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]),
  330:     Pairs = [{Node1, DbNodes2, ShouldBe},
  331:         {Node2, DbNodes1, ShouldBe},
  332:         {Node1, DbNodes1, true},
  333:         {Node2, DbNodes2, true}],
  334:     [?assertEqual(ShouldBelong, lists:member(Element, List))
  335:         || {Element, List, ShouldBelong} <- Pairs].
  336:
